title: TTMM to Wear watch face #2
summary: TTMM to Wear #2 - designer watch faces collection
description: TTMM#2 is a designer watchface colection for Android Wear smartwatches. You will find here pack of 4 original watchfaces: FILLTTMM, TTMMROSE, TTMMSTYLUS and VITTMM. All models have 9 colors customization and work in ambient mode. I hope this collection shows different point of view on a time. Have a great TTMM.FILLTTMMHow do you fill the time? Minutes fill an hourly grid. Hours stand above it.VITTMMTime is an intersection. V stands for hours I marks minutes.TTMMROSETime for the right direction. Outside triangles are hours. Inside triangles are minutes with a five minute period. TTMMSTYLUSShows: month, day, weekday and time ... everything in styleCompatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Idea & design : Albert SalamonAndroid programming : Michał Żyliński© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
TTMM#2 is a designer watchface colection for Android Wear smartwatches. You will find here pack of 4 original watchfaces: FILLTTMM, TTMMROSE, TTMMSTYLUS and VITTMM. All models have 9 colors customization and work in ambient mode. I hope this collection shows different point of view on a time. Have a great TTMM.


FILLTTMM
How do you fill the time? Minutes fill an hourly grid. Hours stand above it.

VITTMM
Time is an intersection. V stands for hours I marks minutes.

TTMMROSE
Time for the right direction. Outside triangles are hours. Inside triangles are minutes with a five minute period.

TTMMSTYLUS
Shows: month, day, weekday and time ... everything in style

Compatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Idea & design : Albert Salamon
Android programming : Michał Żyliński

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
comments: These are great, original faces. With the demise of Pebble I can only hope that there will be some new Wear offerings from TTMM, I'll happily pay
Nice but missing non US date format
